name: Cosmic Nautical Passive T3
owner: the Navigator Eddie, Blackbeard Eddie, The Ancient Mariner, or Ghost Of The Navigator characters.
passiveSkills: Grants +50% increase to all stats in battle
Gain Perfect Immortality, Perfect Accuracy Up and Sleep Shield for 1 turn if Punishment is active on any enemy whenever this talisman becomes active and at the start of your turn
50% Chance to inflict Scalding Burn on attacking enemies for the duration of battle when you take damage
25% Chance to inflict Unblockable Sleep on a random enemy for 1 turn after every action
This effect does not apply to bosses and can be blocked by effects that specifically grant immunity to Sleep
This Talisman's effects only activates when equipped to the Navigator Eddie, Blackbeard Eddie, The Ancient Mariner, or Ghost Of The Navigator characters.
